ch.unige.ng.populations
Class StatisticCache<S extends GlobalIndividual>

java.lang.Object
  ch.unige.ng.populations.StatisticCache<S>

public class StatisticCache<S extends GlobalIndividual>
extends java.lang.Object

Cache object storing different measurements on a population to to speed up the statistic computations.
